attributes.action: Petetition Facebook to let Alfie Usher keep his FYB page open to help veterans
attributes.additional_details: The pages are there to share jokes have a laugh and help those who feel alienated and alone. They can reach out to others who may be going through the same thing.
attributes.background: Let's keep FYB open and running! Facebook let people post absolute dross with far worse than veterans sharing jokes and helping those who are now suffering. To cancel this page is basically taking the voice away from these guys and the outlet they have to work with in order to help them cope.
